channel.title: C++, Shops, Spawning
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new with C++ Coding and I was wondering if this is what you guys code with? because I'm looking for someone that can kind of mentor me in C++, I have a private server of my own but I didnt make the source, I just edited a bit, and I was wondering how these servers where made, and with what compiler (DEV C++, MVSC++, Bolsar,....Exc). Also I wanted to know how to move NPC Shops, and I can't spawn any 5 Digit items, Like Godswords, 3rd Age, exc,. I have heard that shops are moved by Autospawn.cfg but my autospawn isn't a notepad file, or one with which i can edit, It's an internet file. So I can't edit it. Well this is all I need for now,
-Regards

item.title: C++, Shops, Spawning
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“CChhrriiss, post:1, topic:184932”]Hello, I’m new with C++ Coding and I was wondering if this is what you guys code with? because I’m looking for someone that can kind of mentor me in C++, I have a private server of my own but I didnt make the source, I just edited a bit, and I was wondering how these servers where made, and with what compiler (DEV C++, MVSC++, Bolsar,…Exc). Also I wanted to know how to move NPC Shops, and I can’t spawn any 5 Digit items, Like Godswords, 3rd Age, exc,. I have heard that shops are moved by Autospawn.cfg but my autospawn isn’t a notepad file, or one with which i can edit, It’s an internet file. So I can’t edit it. Well this is all I need for now,

-Regards[/quote]
Yes, shops are in autospawn but, there might be a cfg folder, depends on the server, anyway but its a cfg file so it should open with notepad, and most servers use item for 5 digit items

Read full topic

item.title: C++, Shops, Spawning
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Most of the time it’s Java…

But there can be C++ based servers.

Read full topic
